EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Aftermarket R&O Sites Upgrade SAP System

Honeywell Aerospace 1944 E. Sky Harbor Circle Phoenix, AZ 85034
June 11, 2015
Dear Honeywell Customer,
Honeywell is upgrading its Aftermarket Repair & Overhaul (R&O) sites to an enhanced version of SAP, an enterprise resource planning system. With the upgrade, sites will now be able to see the inventory and WIP at other Honeywell locations. We’ll be able to more quickly source parts for you and fulfill requests.
In phase one, we’ll transition the following sites to the SAP solution in August 2015.
Tempe - West Warner Road 1300 West Warner Road Tempe, AZ, US 85284
Honeywell Int. SARL c/o Honeywell Aerospace UK Edison Road Basingstoke, Hampshire, GB RG21 6QD
Wichita - CS ERB & R&O 7227 W. Harry Wichita, KS, US 67209
AES CS Shanghai 430 Li Bing Road, Zhang Jiang Shanghai, CN 201203
At this time there are no changes being made to how you engage with Honeywell. Your Honeywell contacts remain the same.
We will share more details on the timing of the transition and any specific changes over the next 60 days.
Following the successful completion of this initial phase, the team will begin phase two to transition the remaining R&O sites in Renton, Washington; Rocky Mount, North Carolina; Toulouse, France; Tucson, Arizona, and Singapore over to the enhanced SAP solution in October 2015. Details on the second phase will be shared with customers in August.
If you have any questions or concerns, please contact your Honeywell representative or send an email to AeroCPSCommunications@Honeywell.com <mailto:AeroCPSCommunications@Honeywell.com"><span style=>
Yours Sincerely,
Heath Patrick Vice President Customer & Product Support Honeywell Aerospace
